item.title: Outreach
item.author: trive@astro.su.se (Emil Rivera-Thorsen)
item.description: Shared joy is double joy, as the saying goes. I have enjoyed sharing the wonders of the Universe and my own research with Space enthusiasts of various walks of life for as long as I have been active in science.

item.title: Research
item.author: trive@astro.su.se (Emil Rivera-Thorsen)
item.description: I am an observational extragalactic astronomer specialized in the study of star formation and the interstellar medium in highly star-forming (or starburst) galaxies. I study these galaxies using some of the most advances telescopes in the world, including the ESO Very Large Telescope in Paranal, Chile, as well as the Hubble Space Telescope and the new, exciting JWST. Below is a list of some of the projects I have either led or been involved in over the last few years.
